mapper.select: SELECT order_num_in, order_num_out, work_num_in, work_num_out from order_info where MONTH(query_time) = SUBSTRING(#{time},6,2) and is_true= '0'

SELECT max((order_num_in+order_num_out)) as orderToldNum,concat(MONTH(query_time),'月') as month from order_info where DATE_SUB(date(#{time}), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) <= date(query_time) and date(query_time) <= date(#{time}) and is_true='0' GROUP BY month ORDER BY query_time ASC

SELECT max((order_num_in+order_num_out)) as orderToldNum,concat(MONTH(query_time),'月') as month from order_info where DATE_SUB(date(#{time}), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) <= date(query_time) and date(query_time) <= date(#{time}) and is_true='1' GROUP BY month ORDER BY query_time ASC
SELECT id,order_num_in, order_num_out, work_num_in, work_num_out,query_time,create_time,is_true from order_info where query_time = #{time} and is_true = 1
